previousRoles.title: Media Planner
previousRoles.organisation: ZenithOptimedia Group I The ROI Agency
previousRoles.summary:
Assists clients in proposing and conceptualizing ideas for both offline and online media investment
Manages and monitor digital media progress for clients
Liaised and handled communications from external agencies to with clients
Establish and ensures communications with clients to facilitate precise media planning
Prepares progress reports for clients on campaign level 
Provide clients with administrative assistance
Other ad-hoc duties and secretarial work

previousRoles.title: Consultant
previousRoles.summary:
Managed and monitored marketing progress for clients
Assisted clients in proposing and conceptualizing ideas for internal and external events
In charge of planning and coordinating media launches and marketing events 
Provided clients with administrative assistance
Liaised and handled communications from external agencies to with clients
Prepared monthly updates for media exposure to clients
Other ad-hoc duties and secretarial work

educationEntries.course_title: Double Majors: Public Relations and Communication Policy & Technology
